feed.title: RecipeSage Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.13.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directories with 4 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1266
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1267
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1270
  • feat: add refund policy by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1271
  • feat: enable Danish locale by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1272

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.13.2...v2.13.3

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.13.4

  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1282
  • fix: ical throwing 500 by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1283

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.13.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: limit connection pool to 5 in ci by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1288
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1289
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1290
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1291
  • fix: trim label title length to 255 when importing recipe data by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1296
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1294

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.13.5...v2.13.6
